Name: Philstar.com
Content: Former Sen. Bam Aquino emerged as the clear favorite among college students in the final pre-election poll of the Center for Students Initiatives, receiving support from 79.6% of respondents. #Eleksyon2025

Name: The LaSallian
Content: NatSit: 1Sambayan has revealed its lineup for the 2025 Midterm Elections, which includes Senate runners Heidi Mendoza, Luke Espiritu, France Castro, Sonny Matula, Willie Ong, Ariel Querubin, and former Sens. Bam Aquino and Kiko Pangilinan. #Halalan2025

Name: Rappler
Content: In doing things differently this time, De Guzman said that, even without victory, his 2022 run shed light on their progressive platform and agenda, and it was a “good start” that they could build on. #PHVote #BeTheChangeREAD: trib.al/ZxrDBgm

Name: Rappler
Content: Socialist labor leaders Leody de Guzman and Luke Espiritu filed their certificates of candidacy (COCs) for senator on Friday, October 4, in a bid to beat political dynasties and traditional politicians. #PHVote #BeTheChange

Name: GMA Integrated News
Content: Labor leaders Luke Espiritu at Ka Leody de Guzman, naghain ng kanilang pagkandidato sa pagkasenador ngayong ikaapat na araw ng paghahain ng Certificate of Candidacy. (First photo courtesy: Sandra Aguinaldo/GMA Integrated News) #Eleksyon2025

Name: ABS-CBN News
Content: Labor leaders Ka Leody de Guzman and Atty. Luke Espiritu are running under Partido Lakas ng Masa. The two aspirants also vow to push for an anti-political dynasty law. #Halalan2025 | via

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Tbh, I have a hard time taking a survey seriously if, for some reason, they did not include Chel Diokno and Camille Villar. 

And why are progressive names like Espiritu and De Guzman not included despite their 2022 performance, yet Belgica and Abella are here?#Halalan2025

Name: iMPACT Leadership
Content:
ATTY. LUKE 2025?

BMP President Atty. Luke Espiritu has expressed his openness to consider running for senator in the 2025 elections if it helps advance genuine alternatives. However, he stressed that the decision is not solely his to make. #Halalan2025
